Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; top of lip glazed; exterior: at rim, broken maeander band between dilute bands; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '61' is written on the exterior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0465) (phase 2)
